analysis.key_quote: Creating at will employee status for semi senior level staff will only result in termination of employees when political pendulums swing from one end to the other.
analysis.rationale: The comment expresses concerns about the potential for politicization of the civil service and the loss of institutional knowledge, indicating opposition to the proposed rule. It emphasizes the importance of due process and the merit-based system, which aligns with a stance against the rule.
